name: 陳文輝
objective: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
schedule:
Week1: Introduction
Week2: Overview of AI history & Industry Applications
Week3:Uninformed Search
Week4:Informed Search
Week5:Intelligent Agent
Week6:Hill-climbing, simulated annealing and genetic algorithms
Week7:Constraint Satisfaction
Week8:Neural Nets
Week9:Midterm
Week10:Bayesian Networks
Week11:Decision Trees
Week12:Bayes net inference
Week13:Matrix form of games
Week14:Game tree search
Week15:Non-zero-sum games
Week16:Negotiation and Auctions
Week17:Multi-agents
Week18:Finals
scorePolicy:
35 percent: The final exam.
30 percent: The midterm exam.
35 percent: Participation & Assignments.
materials: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, by Russell and Norvig
